DataElement.preferredName: Lesion Description Performed Observation Outcome Lesion Identifier ISO21090.INT.NONNEG.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The integer assigned to a lesion for a subject. NOTE(S): Once a lesion number is designated for a specific lesion that number may not change or re-used to denote a different lesion.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Lesion Description Performed Observation Outcome Lesion Identifier
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.:A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.:One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Constrains INT to a value of 0 or greater.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
